topics.body:
Here's a dumb question: is nerd culture "taking over" western culture?

I don't mean that in a literally taking over western culture, but rather you know how comic book superheroes, comic books and such are now massively mainstream and so are video games, star trek, star wars and such?  I mean like that. . . (suddenly has a funny mental image of forty years in the future with a old granny dressed up as Miku telling her grandchildren of back when Miku was a singing synthesizer program)
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541e263b6368726dc6c30000#post_541e263b6368726dc6c30000
Don't know. Definitely is getting a rise in prominence though.
